item.title: ✍️ Prescriptions
item.description: If one needs a prescription for a medicine in Poland, the fastest way would be one of these special services. Prices vary, but one could expect them to be 50–100 PLN. There are no guarantees, as well, but in case of a refusal refunds are available. Receptozaur (cheaper, full refunds) Receptomat (pricier, with 10 PLN non-refundable fee) MEDICEPT

item.title: ⬛ Code of Practice
item.description: Wear the uniform Think long term (like 30 years from now) Build stories and languages, not things Create your own universe (or join ours) Collect samples Be a sample for somebody else Look for loyalty, not for a skill set Do not build utilitarian products. However, use them as a medium to express yourself Do not exploit introverts — doesn’t work long term. Learn to be an introvert yourself

item.title: 👴🏽 PPK
item.description: Glossary PPK Pracownicze Plany Kapitałowe, employee capital plans. IKE Indywidualne Konto Emerytalne. TFI Towarzystwa Funduszy Inwestycyjnych, investment fund company. PTE Powszechne Towarzystwo Emerytalne, universal pension company. PrTE Pracownicze Towarzystwo Emerytalne, employee pension company. PPE Pracowniczy Program Emerytalny, employee pension plan. General Information PPK is a universal savings system for employees. The main objective of PPK is to provide the participant with additional money, which can be used after the age of 60, and in exceptional situations earlier.

item.title: 📱 Apps
item.description: Apps iBrewCoffee Personal coffee tasting journal. Probably, the most comprehensive one. It has everything: beans, roasters, grinders, methods, ratings, etc. Event kettles! Aeromatic The AeroPress timer app with 50+ recipes. 2 Brew PWA coffee timer with predefined recipes for AeroPress, V60 and Moka pot. coffee.cup.guru Android app with filtered coffee recipes and coffee log.

item.title: 🔺 CAP
item.description: Misc You Can’t Sacrifice Partition Tolerance [EN 🇺🇸] [Oct 2010] Of the CAP theorem’s Consistency, Availability, and Partition Tolerance, Partition Tolerance is mandatory in distributed systems. You cannot not choose it. Instead of CAP, you should think about your availability in terms of yield (~availability, percent of requests answered successfully) and harvest (~consistency, percent of required data actually included in the responses) and which of these two your system will sacrifice when failures happen.

item.title: 🙈 Touch typing
item.description: Learning keybr.com | My "the touch typing trainer". Super-comfy minimalistic interface, I absolutely love it. Comprehensive statistics included. TypingClub Wide selection of programs to learn with comfortable excercises interface. Just good. Ratatype | Pretty intense excerises, with almost no error tolerance. Typing.com Just ok. There is a straightforward learning path here. typing.io Typing real code from OSS projects. TypingAcademy Touch Typing Study Flexing MonkeyType | Nitro Type Key Hero

item.title: 🗜️ AeroPress
item.description: Recipes AeroPrecipe AeroPress recipes. Theory The AeroPress Series by James Hoffmann. [🇬🇧] AeroPress was invented in 2005 by Alan Adler, inventor and retired Stanford University engineering instructor. Brew for about 2 minutes (depends on the grinding). Stir (or swirl). Doubling the amount of coffee for dilution and making two cups doesn’t work. Inverted method has no benefits. Don’t press to hard. Preheating doesn’t make any sense. Brew at 80 °C or 100 °C.
